Container.Name: AWS_EUM_v3
Container.Overview:
AWS End User Messaging (EUM) v3.0.6
Features: • Automatic AWS phone number discovery • Chart.js analytics with real-time updates • Light and Dark mode • Intelligent message segmentation up to 1600 characters • Fixed container startup and environment variable issues • Auto-updates to latest version for security and features • Watchtower integration for seamless container updates • Optional CSP relaxation for custom bridge or macvlan networks
Usage: • Uses :latest tag for automatic updates • Watchtower labels included for auto-update compatibility • Expose the web UI on your chosen host port, mapping to container port 80 • Provide AWS credentials with Pinpoint or SNS SMS permissions • For custom networks (br0.x): Set DISABLE_CSP=true
Auto-Updates: • Container automatically updates with Watchtower • Always runs latest security patches and features • Zero-downtime updates on schedule
Container.Description: AWS EUM v3.0.6+ - Enhanced SMS messaging with auto-updates and network compatibility.

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Host port for the web UI mapped to container port 80

Config.Description: Set true to relax CSP on custom bridge or macvlan networks

Config.Name: HISTORY_RETENTION
Config.Description: Number of messages to keep in history
